titleStmt.title: The sacrifice of the faithfull, or, A treatise shewing the nature, property, and efficacy of zealous prayer together with some motives to prayer, and helps against discouragements in prayer : to which is added seven profitable sermons / by William Fenner ...
titleStmt.author: Fenner, William, 1600-1640.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: The seven sermons lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
